Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 11 Mar 2019The NIKKO AM SINGAPORE STI ETF (G3B) distributes dividends about twice a year. You can check out the dividend history here: https://www.dividends.sg/view/G3B0 comments1

Zann ChuaLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 11 Mar 2019Hello! If i am not wrong, they give out dividends twice a year.The Nikko AM STI ETF usually gives out dividends around May and October each year.
